articles.title: Scientists find hidden switch that lets tumors shapeshift and evade treatment
articles.description: Scientists are uncovering what makes some carcinomas so resistant: their ability to change identity. Two new studies reveal crucial proteins and structures that could become targets for future therapies. articles.title: Your brain shows damage before your blood pressure even rises
articles.description: Hypertension begins harming the brain surprisingly early, even before measurable blood pressure increases.
